source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select count (*) as RecordCount
from Saleslt.Customer_copy
select count (*) as RecordCount from saleslt.product
select count (*) as RecordCount from saleslt.product
select max (ModifiedDate) as LastRecordDate from salesLT.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('ACT_LKP_Get_High_WaterMark_TimeStamp').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('ACT_LKP_Get_Last_Modified_TimeStamp').output.firstRow.LastRecordDate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select hw_date from dbo.HW_table where
tablename= 'Customer'
select max (ModifiedDate) as LastRecordDate from salesLT.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('ACT_LKP_Get_High_WaterMark_TimeStamp').output.firstRow.hw_date
}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('ACT_LKP_Get_Last_Modified_TimeStamp').output.firstRow.LastRecordDate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max (ModifiedDate) as LastRecordDate from salesLT.customer
